name: Weed Boss 3 - Bloody Bud Farm Wars And Firm Shop 2
name_original: Weed Boss 3 - Bloody Bud Farm Wars And Firm Shop 2
description:
The Sequel to the Best Weed Game is finally here on the app store!

Selling weed isn't difficult, but dealing successfully is.

Weed Boss 3 is a fantastic addictive weed dealing game where you start from growing weed in your basement weed firm to making billions. You face all problems that a successful dealer goes through.

How to play the game - Keep clicking, clicking and clicking until you have enough weed to multiply then grow and keep multiplying. Your goal is to become the Weed Boss!


Features:
- Buying different labs to grow different weed strains
- Recruiting gangs around the world to help distribution
- Growing reputation to deal in bulks
- From making $10's to thousands to millions to billions to KB's to MB's to BB's to kBB's. even MBB or BBB.
- Offline Production
- SOOO MANY ACCESSORIES!!


Act quick and become the next famous Weed Boss! .... be the first to click through 1 BILLION Weed!

We're always listening to all feedback we receive! We want to make Weed Boss 3 the absolute best Weed and idle/incremental game and your feedback helps us reach that goal. We read *everything* you send us, so please let us know what you'd like to see! :)
